name: Flourish (Tide Clima)
description:
Bee happy bzzz...

🐝🐝🐝

Explore the giant bees' realms . Recollect pollen from flowers with help from the bees.🐝🐝🐝

This game has not a clear purpose yet. Just a little level that works like a playground.

Would like to hear some feedback :3

Controls:

Left click: Shoot seed or bee.

Right click: Absorb bee.

Mousewheel: Change between card items.

Escape: Access the in-game menu.

How the gameplay works as of 0.0.1.Alpha:

You need to find some bees and flowers to plant. Search for magick cards. Bees can only gather pollen from the flowers of the same type. For example: a purple be can only gather pollen from purple tulips.

The level of happiness is based on the plants and bees around you, try to have as much as you can, but keeping a balance.
